com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.transform.row

Class DataRowsRemoval<C>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.transform.row.DataRowsRemoval<C>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataTableTransformation, MutatingDataTableTransformation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicDataRowsRemoval

    public abstract class DataRowsRemoval<C>
extends java.lang.Object
implements MutatingDataTableTransformation
    The DataRowsRemoval class is a mutating data table transformation which removes rows from the table. Note that this is not a row-wise transformation, but rather is applied atomically; this is because the removal of rows inherently affects row indices (and iterators) and thus row-wise independence of transformations cannot be guaranteed.

    This class uses a filter to determine if a row should be removed or not. It is important to note that if a data row passes the filter (that is, the filter returns true for the data row), then it will be removed; only those data rows blocked by the filter are retained in the data table. The filter works on ContextDataRows, allowing this class to be mixed in with interfaces representing contextual transformations.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataRowsRemoval

        public DataRowsRemoval(Filter<ContextDataRow<C>> rowFilter)
        Constructor specifying the row filter used to determine which rows to remove from the table. If the row filter returns true for a certain data row, then that row will be removed from the table.
        Parameters:
        rowFilter - The filter used to determine which rows to remove.

    • Method Detail

      • getContextDataRow

        protected abstract ContextDataRow<C> getContextDataRow(DataRow row,
                                  DataTable table,
                                  int rowIndex)
        Get the context data row for a given row in the table.
        Parameters:
        row - The data row.
        table - The source data table.
        rowIndex - The index of the row in table.
        Returns:
        the appropriate context data row for row.

      • processRowToBeRemoved

        protected void processRowToBeRemoved(ContextDataRow<C> contextDataRow,
                         DataTable table,
                         int rowIndex)
        Do something with a row which will be removed by this transformation. This method could be used to collect the number of rows that were deleted, or some attributes about them. By default, this it does nothing.
        Parameters:
        contextDataRow - The row which will be removed.
        table - The table from which the row wil be removed.
        rowIndex - The index of the row in table.
